A compound produced from the hallucinogenic venom of certain spiders, shiver is common in black markets. The addiction to shiver has the [virulent](/Traits.aspx?ID=162) trait.

**Saving Throw** DC 19 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 4 hours; **Stage 1** whenever you become [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19), reduce that condition’s value by 1 (10 minutes); **Stage 2** [clumsy 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) (1 hour); **Stage 3** [asleep](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) (1 hour)
